model

Interface CalcAverages<N extends Process>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FIFO, Priority, RoundRobin, Scheduler, SJF, SRT

    public interface CalcAverages<N extends Process>
    Methods to calculate the average wait and turn around times of multiple processes
    Author:
    Peter Vukas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default double averageTurnAround(ArrayList<N> alp) 
      default double averageWait(ArrayList<N> alp) 
      default double littleAverageArrivalRate(double n, double w)
      Calculation with little's formula
      default double littleAverageQueueLength(double w, double lambda)
      Calculation with little's formula
      default double littleAverageWaitTime(double n, double lambda)
      Calculation with little's formula

    • Method Detail

      • averageWait

        default double averageWait(ArrayList<N> alp)
                    throws InvalidTimeException
        Parameters:
        alp - An array list of all processes to be included in the average
        Returns:
        A double value of the average wait time
        Throws:
        InvalidTimeException - Thrown when a process is found without a wait time

      • averageTurnAround

        default double averageTurnAround(ArrayList<N> alp)
                          throws InvalidTimeException
        Parameters:
        alp - An array list of all processes to be included in the average
        Returns:
        A double value of the average turn around time
        Throws:
        InvalidTimeException - Thrown when a process is found without a turn around time

      • littleAverageQueueLength

        default double littleAverageQueueLength(double w,
                                        double lambda)
        Calculation with little's formula
        Parameters:
        w - Average wait time in queue
        lambda - Average arrival rate into queue
        Returns:
        Average queue length

      • littleAverageWaitTime

        default double littleAverageWaitTime(double n,
                                     double lambda)
        Calculation with little's formula
        Parameters:
        n - Average queue length
        lambda - Average arrival rate into queue
        Returns:
        Average wait time in queue

      • littleAverageArrivalRate

        default double littleAverageArrivalRate(double n,
                                        double w)
        Calculation with little's formula
        Parameters:
        n - Average queue length
        w - Average wait time in queue
        Returns:
        Average arrival rate into queue
